page.title: 10Working at Wychem
page.content: IT is most important to work safely when using chemicals.Staff at {wychem} have regular check-ups and blood tests,which are required by law.No women are employed in case an unborn baby is harmed in any way.When handling different substances the men wear masks,goggles,helmets,boiler-suitsand boots.A system of labelling each chemical ie. toxic, irritantpoison etc. is always used.Wychem have an enormous book from which to follow instructions when sending chemicals by road.A book is also kept as a record of where everything is at any given time.Extractor fans keep the air clean for the workers. Waste material is put into effluent tanks and neutralised,then put into a land-fill pit hundreds of feet underground.
